title: Racing Obstacle Course
briefDescription: Try to beat your friends in this racing obstacle course. You?ll have to make your way through multiple obstacles to win your place in ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Try to beat your friends in this racing obstacle course. You?ll have to make your way through multiple obstacles to win your place in the race!
You think you can come in first place?
Every player will start at the start line.
Once the race has been set to start, you?ll have a 5 second heads up!
There are many ways for a player to fall behind in this race!
But there is also many ways to avoid falling behind!
Try to come in first place!!

crawledImageUrls.text: This is NOT just a regular ?find the button? map! It has different challenges in every level. There are 5 levels, all of them are possible. I?m sure you can do this!

title: The Cave [Puzzle] [Parkour] [Adventure]
briefDescription: You wake up in a cave having no idea how you got there. The only way out is through the means of restoring power to ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You wake up in a cave having no idea how you got there. The only way out is through the means of restoring power to a broken down elevator. Will you make it out of the cave?
?The Cave? is a mashup between puzzle, parkour, and some-what of trivia with some exploration into the mix.
Objective: Restore power to an elevator to escape the cave
____ Q&A ____
How long is the map?
20 minutes ? an hour
Is this my first map?
Yes, so if it has any bugs or anything you think needs improving let me now, thx.
Is the map easy?
Pretty difficult for newcomers to parkour, but relatively easy if you know what you?re doing.
Thanks for checking out the map and I hope you download and like the map ?

title: What Doesn?t Belong
briefDescription: Choose the block, entity or item which you think doesn't belong. With four stages and 25 levels you might have a hard time! Use the hint ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Choose the block, entity or item which you think doesn?t belong. With four stages and 25 levels you might have a hard time! Use the hint button, or just think about it to progress in the level. Green is easy, yellow is medium and red is hard. At the end it will show you how you did it. Answers will be in the next room.

title: Infinity Hallway
briefDescription: INTRODUCTION **Map Made for MC Bedrock Edition**The file contains the map + bonus skin for anyone who downloads the map. This map was inspired by ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
INTRODUCTION
**Map Made for MC Bedrock Edition**
The file contains the map + bonus skin for anyone who downloads the map.
This map was inspired by Minecraft Java edition Infinity hallway sections in a certain map. The point of this map is to get the player to go and get confused by the nature of the carefully programmed events. The player will experience a never ending hallway which cannot be escaped from.
HOW TO PLAY
1) Download the map.
2) Press the button given at the starting room.
3) Done, you will now start your never ending journey!
CREDITS
Created by PlayPure, links to Channel and Instagram in bio.

title: Otherworlded [Puzzle] [Adventure]
briefDescription: To start off, this is my first map I?ve uploaded on here, so I hope you like it! Otherworlded is a puzzle map based ...

crawledImageUrls.text: To start off, this is my first map I?ve uploaded on here, so I hope you like it! Otherworlded is a puzzle map based around traveling through different worlds to get to the end of an obstacle. Some levels are easy, some are hard, and all are possible! Good luck!

title: Puzzle Block
briefDescription: 14 unique puzzles - all in one tiny cube. Can you solve them all and get out? It's primarily a single player map, but it's also ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
14 unique puzzles ? all in one tiny cube. Can you solve them all and get out? It?s primarily a single player map, but it?s also compatible for multiplayer, however it?s not recommended. If things break due to playing on multiplayer, please don?t whine to me.
Please alert me of any bugs or errors in the map
Recommended to have basic redstone knowledge (if you know how to place a piston facing the right way, you?re good).
If you record a video of this map, please send me a link on twitter (@gamer_shy_), and be sure to credit me in the description.
Please do not redistribute this map under your own name. You?re free to send this page anywhere you?d like, but don?t reupload it without consent.
Oh, and no adfly link. Those things are annoying for me so I won?t put anyone through it.
Can you escape?
